Events: Event.Update, TerminalEvent, TerminalEvent.SignatureRequest, TerminalEvent.SignatureConfirmation, TerminalEvent.AppSignatureConfirmation , TerminalEvent.PaymentInfo

      • getSales

        io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List<de.wirecard.epos.model.sale.sales.SaleLight>> getSales(de.wirecard.epos.model.sale.sales.Filter filter)
        Return List of SaleLight which contains basic information of sale. Used to list many data. Filter is mandatory to prevent of listing all data.
        Parameters:
        filter - allows to filter data by some of a sale attributes.

      • getSale

        io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.sale.sales.Sale> getSale(java.lang.String id)
        Return specific sale with given id.
        Parameters:
        id - id of sale you want from backend.

      • getSales

        io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List<de.wirecard.epos.model.sale.sales.Sale>> getSales(java.lang.String originalSaleId)
        Return List of all Sale with given saleId. Unlike SaleLight, Sale contains all information of sale.
        Parameters:
        originalSaleId - of wanted Sale

      • getSale

        Return List of SaleLight with given merchantReceiptId
        Parameters:
        merchantReceiptId - of wanted SaleLight

      • getSaleStatistics

        io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List<de.wirecard.epos.model.sale.sales.SaleStatistics>> getSaleStatistics(@NonNull
                                                                                                        java.lang.String merchantId,
                                                                                                        @NonNull
                                                                                                        java.util.Currency currency,
                                                                                                        @NonNull
                                                                                                        org.threeten.bp.OffsetDateTime periodFrom,
                                                                                                        @NonNull
                                                                                                        org.threeten.bp.OffsetDateTime periodTo,
                                                                                                        de.wirecard.epos.model.sale.sales.StatisticsFilter filter)
        Return SaleStatistics that meets given requirements.
        Parameters:
        merchantId - for which merchant you want to generate statistics
        currency - for which currency you want to generate statistics
        periodFrom - since which OffsetDateTime period statistics should be generate
        periodTo - until which OffsetDateTime period statistics should be generate
        filter - e.g. filter data by period, group by status/operations

      • saleReturn

        io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.sale.sales.Sale> saleReturn(java.util.List<de.wirecard.epos.model.sale.request.payment.AReturnPayment> returnPayment,
                                                                       java.lang.String originalSaleId,
                                                                       java.util.Currency currency,
                                                                       java.util.List<de.wirecard.epos.model.sale.sales.SaleItem> items,
                                                                       boolean unitPricesIncludeTax,
                                                                       java.lang.String cashRegisterId)
        Return request of sale with given originalSaleId. After successful money refund callback returns refunded Sale.
        Parameters:
        returnPayment - list of returning payments types
        originalSaleId - ID of sale
        currency - currency of items
        items - list of SaleItem which should be returned
        unitPricesIncludeTax - true if individual prices for items includes tax
        cashRegisterId - id of currently selected cash register

      • saleReverse

        io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.sale.response.SaleNonErrorResponse> saleReverse(java.lang.String salesId,
                                                                                           java.lang.String cashRegisterId)
        Reverse request of sale with given salesId. Returns SaleNonErrorResponse.
        Parameters:
        salesId - ID of sale
        cashRegisterId - id of currently selected cash register

      • sendReceipt

        io.reactivex.Completable sendReceipt(de.wirecard.epos.model.sale.SendingWay way,
                                     java.lang.String id,
                                     java.lang.String byWhat)
        Request for sending receipt by SMS or EMAIL
        Parameters:
        way - Email or SMS
        id - id of sale
        byWhat - email or number
